description: The VEN_NET_CONT table contains basic information about your Vendor-Network Contracts used primarily to price referrals and AP Claims. This table also contains information about your reimbursement contracts used in billing system to compare revenue you received from a payor to what you expected to receive.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the contract record.

columns.name: CONTRACT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Vendor-Network contract.
